bibl.title: Telegram from Joseph C. Furnas to John J. Moran, March 16, 1939

div1.p: Furnas requests a photograph of Moran's medal.

div1.head: Telegram from Joseph C. Furnas to John J. Moran, March 16, 1939
div1.opener:
50 M. 2 3·39
FORM 1289·HV
WESTERN UNION
CABLEGRAMA
R. B. WHITE
PRESIDENT
NEWCOMB CARLTON
CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD
J. C. WILLEVER
FIRST VICE-PRESIDENT
Recibido en la Habana: Obispo No. 351, esquina a Habana.
1939 MAR 16
CDA 304=CD NEW YORK NY 30 16
NLT JOHN J MORAN= COMPANIA SUNOCO DE CUBA AVENIDA MENOCAL 455 HAVANA=
div1.p:
COULD YOU SEND AIR MAIL MARTIN AT POST YOUR PHOTOGRAPH
MEDAL SUN COMPANY PHOTOGRAPH PRETTY SMALL REGARDS=
